name: They Are Coming! (itch)
description:
Important Notes!

After the Brackeys GameJam major updates will come. There are several fatal bugs. If you find them please comment!

Also original OPERA is a good browser to run this game at 60 fps. Even Internet Explorer is better than chrome for some reason.

ALSO IF YOU DIE, IN ORDER TO AVOID THE MAJOR BUG RESTART THE GAME BY F5.

THEY ARE COMING

You are with him and his daughter. Transcendental experiments meeting with science has caused them to appear and they are coming! But, don't worry. He is a great engineer. Help him to protect his daughter from them!

But, are you ready?  Defend the house from  transcendental creatures. Die but come back to continue your fight!

Game Play

Enemies will be following the road to reach the safe house! Help the engineer collect woods and magicores to build Towers to defend and Woodcutters to collect wood! Don't forget! You have to COLLECT to build TOWERS!

W A S D and ARROW Keys to move around.

F to interact!
